      Method to sign and encrypt a secured message using the given algorithm and private keys and returns another message with an attached signature according to the ITS specification with EccPointType x_coordinate_only containing the R value.

      SecuredMessage CryptoManager.verifyAndDecryptSecuredMessage(SecuredMessage message, Certificate receiverCertificate, PrivateKey receiverKey)
      Method used to verify and decrypt a ITS secure message that contains a signer info of type certificate, for certificate_digest_with_ecdsap256 it needed to use the alternative verifySecureMessage function and supplying the related certificate.
